title: Old Chromas

replies.body:
Towards the bottom of that page, there's an FAQ that lists out how often we do those types of sales. They aren't on a strict schedule I don't believe, but we aim for doing two of those chroma ip sales a year. There's already been a few that happened in the past.

> HOW DO I BUY CHROMAS FOR IP?
> You can purchase chromas for IP during special chroma IP sales that take place twice a year. During these promotion periods, you can purchase a chroma for 2000 IP.
